channel.title: Pacific Highway West on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Pacific Highway West on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 192 and 194AB
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 192 - OR-99/Bus. OR-126 West/University of Oregon/Eugene Downtown. Approaching (Exit 194AB) I-105/OR-126. Continue north on I-5 for Portland.

item.title: I-5 North - Exits 191 and 192
item.description: I-5 north at Exit 191 - Bus. OR-126 East/Glenwood Blvd./Springfield Downtown. Approaching Exit 192 - OR-99/Bus. OR-126 West/University of Oregon/Eugene Downtown. Use Exit 192 for University of Oregon Museums.

item.title: OR-99W North/OR-219 South Split in Newberg
item.description: OR-99W North/OR-219 South split in Newberg. Use OR-219 south for Champoeg State Park, St. Paul, and Salem. Continue north on OR-99W for Portland.

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-219
item.description: OR-99W North Approaching OR-219 North to Scholls and Hillsboro. OR-219 joins OR-99W through Newberg.

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-240
item.description: OR-99W north approaching OR-240 north to Chehalem Valley and Yamhill. Use left lanes for OR-240 North.

item.title: OR-99W South/US-20/OR-34 West - Corvallis
item.description: OR-99W South/US-20/OR-34 West along SW 4th St. in Corvallis.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 West at OR-99W
item.description: US-20/OR-34 West (NW Harrison Blvd.) at OR-99W South (NW 4th St.). Turn left to continue west on US-20/OR-34 West which joins OR-99W through Corvallis.

item.title: US-20 East (NE Harrison Blvd.) at OR-99W at (NW 3rd St.)
item.description: US-20 East (NE Harrison Blvd.) at OR-99W at (NW 3rd St.) in Corvallis. Turn right for OR-99W North to Monmouth and Portland. Continue straight for US-20/OR-34 West/OR-99W South to Philomath, Ocean Beaches, and Eugene. Notice the OR-99W North shield is incorrectly displayed as a US highway shield.

item.title: US-20/OR-34 East at US-20/OR-99W
item.description: US-20/OR-34 east at US-20/OR-99W junction. Merge right to continue east on US-20. Use US-20 East/OR-99W for Downtown (Corvallis).

item.title: OR-99 South Approaching OR-36
item.description: OR-99 south approaching OR-36 west to Cheshire and Florence.

item.title: OR-99 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance to Eugene on OR-99 south in Junction City.

item.title: End OR-99E at OR-99W/OR-99
item.description: End OR-99E at OR-99W/OR-99. Turn right for OR-99W north to Monroe and Corvallis. Continue straight for OR-99 south to Eugene and Junction City.

item.title: End OR-99E South at OR-99W/OR-99
item.description: End OR-99E south at OR-99W/OR-99 in Junction City.

item.title: OR-99W North/OR-219 South - Newberg
item.description: OR-99W North/OR-219 South in Newberg. Use right lanes to continue north on OR-99W (to Portland) and south on OR-219 (to Salem).

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-219
item.description: OR-99W North Approaching OR-219 North to Scholls and Hillsboro. OR-219 joins OR-99W through Newberg.

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-240
item.description: OR-99W North approaching OR-240 in Newberg.

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-240
item.description: OR-99W north approaching OR-240 north to Chehalem Valley and Yamhill. Use left lanes for OR-240 North.

item.title: OR-99W North at OR-233 and OR-18
item.description: OR-99W North at OR-233 and OR-18 west to Dayton and Salem. OR-18 is the McMinnville Bypass, which runs along the south side of the city of McMinnville. This the eastern end of the bypass.

item.title: OR-99W North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-99W north to Newberg and Portland. Taken on the east side of Lafayette.

item.title: OR-99W North at OR-47 North
item.description: OR-99W North at OR-47 North. Use OR-47 north for Yamhill and Gaston.

item.title: OR-99W North Approaching OR-47
item.description: OR-99W North approaching OR-47 North. Use OR-47 north for Carlton and Forest Grove.

item.title: Lafayette Ave. North at OR-99W
item.description: Lafayette Ave. North at OR-99W in McMinnville. Turn left on OR-99W North for Forest Grove (via OR-47) and Portland. Turn left on OR-99W (South) for Corvallis and the Oregon Coast (via OR-18). In many places in Oregon the coast is referred to as the Oregon Coast on road signs.

item.title: SW Baker St. North at OR-99W
item.description: SW Baker St. North at OR-99W. SW Baker St. is the ramp that connects OR-18 eastbound to OR-99W northbound and turns into a surface street. It is signed as OR-99W, but does not actually reach OR-99W until this light at Old Sheridan Road. Turn right for OR-99W South to Amity and Corvallis. Continue ahead for Linfield College and City Center (McMinnville).

item.title: SW Baker St. North Approaching OR-99W
item.description: SW Baker St. North approaching OR-99W. SW Baker St. is the ramp from OR-18 East to OR-99W north, and is signed as OR-99W. SW Baker St. actually joins with OR-99W at the next intersection with Old Sheridan Road.

item.title: OR-18 East at OR-99W North
item.description: OR-18 East at OR-99W North. Merge left for OR-99W/McMinnville. Stay right for OR-18 East/Dayton/Portland. This is the western end of the McMinnville bypass. OR-18 and OR-99W join on the east side of McMinnville.

item.title: OR-18 East - Route Diagram
item.description: OR-18 East route diagram for McMinnville area, approaching OR-99W junction. Use OR-99W as a business loop through McMinnville. Use OR-18 as a bypass around McMinnville.

item.title: OR-18 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-99W. Merge right for OR-18 East towards Dayton and Portland.

item.title: OR-18 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-18 east approaching OR-99W. Use left lane for OR-99W North to McMinnville.

item.title: OR-217 South - Exit 6
item.description: OR-217 south at Exit 6 - OR-99W/Tigard/McMinnville.

item.title: OR-217 South Approaching Exit 6
item.description: OR-217 south approaching Exit 6 - OR-99W/McMinnville/Tigard.

item.title: OR-126 East/OR-99 South at I-105
item.description: OR-126 East/OR-99 South at I-105. OR-126 East joins I-105 east to I-5 and Springfield. OR-99 continues south through Eugene.

item.title: OR-126 East/OR-99 South Approaching I-105
item.description: OR-126 East/OR-99 South approaching I-105/OR-126 in downtown Eugene. This is the beginning of I-105.

item.title: OR-126 East/OR-99 South in Eugene
item.description: OR-126 East/OR-99 South along 7th St. in Eugene.

item.title: OR-126 East at OR-99
item.description: OR-126 East (Garfield St.) at 7th St. OR-126 East joins OR-99 South into downtown Eugene. Continue ahead for OR-99 north to Airport and Junction City.

item.title: OR-126 East Approaching OR-99
item.description: OR-126 East approaching OR-99 in Eugene. OR-99 South/OR-126 East join through downtown Eugene. Use OR-99 South/OR-126 East for I-5.

item.title: OR-126 East (11th St.) Approaching Garfield St.
item.description: OR-126 East (11th St.) Approaching Garfield St. OR-126 turns left on Garfield St. and connects with OR-99 a few blocks to the north.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 east approaching OR-99W to Monmouth and McMinnville.

item.title: OR-22 East Approaching OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 East approaching OR-99W to McMinnville and Monmouth.

item.title: OR-22 East at OR-99W
item.description: OR-22 east at OR-99W. Use OR-99W south to Rickreall Fairgrounds, and Monmouth. Use OR-99W north to McMinnville. Continue east on OR-22 to Salem. This intersection has been replaced with a full interchange.
